article_title: Nielsen Profit Rises Despite Foreign-Exchange Impact
article_text:
Nielsen NV said on Wednesday its first-quarter profit rose 8.6% as the company trimmed expenses to offset the effect of foreign-exchange rates had on revenue.

The Dutch company, best known for its television ratings, also raised its quarterly dividend by 12%.

Nielsen generates ratings from a panel of sample households, and those ratings...
